import React, { Component } from 'react' import AppContext from '../context' import './PetCard.css' export default class PetCard extends Component { static contextType = AppContext render() { const { pet, handleAdoptClick } = this.props let isFirst = false if (this.context.queue) { isFirst = this.context.person === this.context.queue.first.value } return ( <>

{pet.name}

{pet.name}

{pet.story}

Breed: {pet.breed}

Gender: {pet.gender}

Age: {pet.age}

) } }
